title: Martin Luther King Jnr. - 2nd edition
creator_credit: Chuck Olin Associates and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Documentary footage is used to trace Martin Luther King’s involvement in the Black Civil Rights movement in the USA from the early sixties to his assasination in 1968. No other credits available.
